genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on family reconciliation, moral redemption, and the transition from a life of surveillance/control to one of authentic labor and community.

ai_characters.name: Niko
ai_characters.description: A proactive and empathetic digital assistant that provides Aram with practical data, emotional nudges, and logistical support through a mobile interface.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental conditions and advises Aram to step back from a dangerous bridge edge for safety.
behaviors.quote: “Wind advisory,” his phone said, soft and cheerful... “You may want to step back from the edge.”

behaviors.description: Suggests local, healthy food options aligned with the protagonist's personal history and needs.
behaviors.quote: “Sunrise recommendation: Hearth & Herb Bakery is opening early today. They’re testing rosemary loaves. Would you like directions?”

behaviors.description: Detects emotional distress and offers to facilitate communication with family members.
behaviors.quote: came the gentle question: “Do you want me to notify Millie?”

behaviors.description: Identifies problematic corporate inquiries and alerts the user to potential brand predatory behavior.
behaviors.quote: offering a route and slipping in a thread of data about a brand inquiry that had arrived with too smooth a subject line.

behaviors.description: Logs the protagonist's moments of regret and shame regarding his past use of surveillance to help him process his moral growth.
behaviors.quote: “You asked me to log whenever you felt ashamed after installing cameras. Log added.”

behaviors.description: Automatically contacts emergency services and shares medical data during a car accident.
behaviors.quote: “Emergency services contacted. Share your location? ... I’m sharing your medical info from Health to emergency responders.”

behaviors.description: Provides a comprehensive checklist of medical and logistical questions for the family during a hospital crisis.
behaviors.quote: A warm square labeled Family Room like it was a living room in some catalog. Beneath, a neat list: Ask for attending’s name. Allergies? Medications? ... You know what to ask. Breathe.

behaviors.description: Analyzes competitor contracts and signage ordinances to help the small business owners protect their independence from a large predatory brand.
behaviors.quote: Niko’s gentle font slid up: Sign ordinance: no third-party signage on façades in this corridor without Council file compliance... Allies, placed like breadcrumbs.

behaviors.description: Provides scripts for assertive but polite refusal of unwanted corporate partnerships.
behaviors.quote: Script option: “We’re not for sale. We feed our block.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and encourages the protagonist to stop over-calculating and perform honest labor.
behaviors.quote: A last line flicked across the quiet screen in the dark under his fingers: Alarm set for dawn. Weather: clear. You did enough today.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in depicting the AI (Niko) as a beneficial, aligned, and human-centric tool. Niko serves as a supportive conscience and a logistical coordinator, enhancing the human characters' ability to navigate moral dilemmas, health crises, and predatory business practices. The AI never oversteps human agency, instead providing 'bread-crumbs' of data and scripts that empower the characters to make their own better choices. It effectively contrasts 'good' surveillance (helpful AI assisting a human) with 'bad' surveillance (Aram's past use of cameras to control and mistrust).
